name: I Have No Energy To Get Out Of Bed And I Must Pee
name_original: I Have No Energy To Get Out Of Bed And I Must Pee
description: I kept hearing about "I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream" so often when it got added to GOG that my brain created this "I Have _____ And I Must _____" madlib in my head, of which the title of this game was my favorite.
